introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: Mauber Informática is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your information when you use our applications and services.

dataCollection.title: 2. Information Collection
dataCollection.content: We may collect the following types of information:
items: Personal identification information (name, email address, phone number)
Usage and browsing data in applications
Device information (model, operating system, unique identifiers)
Location data (when authorized by the user)

dataUsage.title: 3. Use of Information
dataUsage.content: The information collected is used to:
items: Provide, operate, and improve our services
Personalize your user experience
Communicate updates and news about our applications
Ensure security and prevent fraud

dataSharing.title: 4. Data Sharing
dataSharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share data only with trusted service providers who assist us in operating the applications, always under confidentiality agreements.

security.title: 5. Security
security.content: We implement technical and organizational security measures to protect your information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

userRights.title: 6. Your Rights
items: Access your personal information
Request correction of incorrect data
Request deletion of your data
Withdraw consent for data processing

cookies.title: 7. Cookies and Similar Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience, analyze application usage, and personalize content. You can manage your cookie preferences in your device settings.

changes.title: 8. Changes to this Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. We will notify you of significant changes through our applications or by email.

contact.title: 9. Contact
contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using Mauber Informática's applications and services, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms of Use. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you should not use our services.

services.title: 2. Description of Services
services.content: Mauber Informática develops and provides mobile applications for Android and iOS platforms. Our services may include various functionalities as specified in each application, and we reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any service at any time.

userAccount.title: 3. User Account
userAccount.content: To use certain features of our applications, you may need to create an account. You agree to:
items: Provide accurate, current, and complete information during registration
Maintain the security of your password and identification
Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account
Be responsible for all activities conducted through your account

acceptableUse.title: 4. Acceptable Use
acceptableUse.content: You agree not to use our services to:
items: Violate any applicable laws or regulations
Infringe upon third-party intellectual property rights
Transmit viruses, malware, or any malicious code
Interfere with or disrupt services or servers
Collect information from other users without consent

intellectualProperty.title: 5. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All intellectual property rights related to our applications and services, including but not limited to source code, design, trademarks, and content, are the exclusive property of Mauber Informática. You may not copy, modify, distribute, or create derivative works without our prior written authorization.

liability.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: Services are provided 'as is' without warranties of any kind. Mauber Informática is not liable for direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages resulting from the use or inability to use our services. We do not guarantee that services will be uninterrupted, secure, or error-free.

modifications.title: 7. Modifications of Services and Terms
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify or discontinue, temporarily or permanently, our services (or any part thereof) with or without notice. We may also update these Terms of Use periodically. Continued use of services after modifications constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

termination.title: 8. Termination
termination.content: We may suspend or terminate your access to our services at any time, without prior notice, for conduct that we believe violates these Terms of Use or is harmful to other users, us, or third parties, or for any other reason.

governingLaw.title: 9. Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These Terms of Use shall be governed and interpreted in accordance with the laws of Brazil, without regard to conflict of law provisions. Any dispute related to these terms shall be resolved in the competent courts of Brazil.

about.title: About Mauber Informática
about.subtitle: Brazilian company specialized in mobile app development and digital solutions

introduction.content1: Mauber Informática is a Brazilian company specialized in mobile app development, digital solutions, and technology applied to the daily lives of people and businesses.
introduction.content2: We create simple, efficient, and secure experiences, combining best practices in design, software engineering, and modern cloud infrastructure.

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
whoWeAre.content: The company is registered in Brazil under CNPJ 04.510.476/0001-23 and has been operating since 2001 in the information technology field, focusing on development, innovation, and technical consulting.

ourWork.title: Our Work
items: Applications for Android and iOS
Solutions based on Firebase and cloud services
Digital platforms and productivity tools
Independent apps and custom projects
ourWork.commitment: Our commitment is to deliver stable, functional, and secure software, with special attention to user experience and data privacy.

mission.title: Mission
mission.content: To create useful, accessible, and well-built applications that simplify users' lives and deliver real value in their daily routines.
